entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:15 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -36.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 07:38 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -36.9°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -41.2°C
Wind: N 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 49 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 36 in the afternoon.
